products.title: Rimini, Miami Yellow - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini, miami yellow - roller blind well, the name says it all! The rimini's miami yellow is bright, funky, and summery. Due to its lightweight but sturdy fabric, it has a surprising level of opaqueness, despite its light colour. Not that you'll notice, w
products.productdescription: Well, the name says it all! The rimini's miami yellow is bright, funky, and summery. Due to its lightweight but sturdy fabric, it has a surprising level of opaqueness, despite its light colour. Not that you'll notice, with the colour of sunshine in your window! This is the ideal hue for creating a sunny, cheery kitchen, or a fun, energetic home office. Pair with creams and pretty florals for some country chic, or with sky blue shades for a fun, summery feel.

Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.  All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.productdescription:
Their moisture-resistant splash solar yellow electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The bold yellow roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm saturated shade. 
 
Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.
